#include<bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

typedef long long ll;

ll f[1010]={0},inf[1010]={0};

ll power( ll base, ll expo )
{
    ll ans=1;
    while(expo)
    {
	if(expo%2)
	{
	    ans = ( (ans%1009)*(base%1009) ) % 1009;
	}
	expo/=2;
	base = ( (base%1009)*(base%1009) ) % 1009;
    }
    return ans;
}

void comp()
{
    ll i;
    ll ff=1,iff=1;
    f[0]=inf[0]=1;
    for(i=1;i<1010;++i)
    {
	ff = ( (ff%1009)*(i%1009) ) % 1009;
	f[i]=ff;
	iff = ( (iff%1009)*power(i,1007) ) % 1009;
	inf[i]=iff;
    }
}

int main()
{
    ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
    comp();
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
	ll n,k,x,y;
	cin>>n>>k;
	ll ans=1;
	while(n)
	{
	    x=n%1009;
	    y=k%1009;
	    if(x<y)
	    {
		ans=0;
		break;
	    }
	    ans = ( (ans%1009)*(f[x]%1009) ) % 1009;
	    ans = ( (ans%1009)*(inf[y]%1009) ) % 1009;
	    ans = ( (ans%1009)*(inf[x-y]%1009) ) % 1009;
	    n=n/1009;
	    k=k/1009;
	}
	cout<<ans<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
